subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Colin Montgomerie and Marc Warren gave Scotland its first victory in the World Cup of Golf, beating Boo Weekley and Heath Slocum of the United States in Shenzhen, China, with a par on the third hole of a playoff. Weekley missed a 15-foot putt for par on the third playoff hole after Montgomerie tapped in. Scotland shot a six-under-par 66, and the United States had a 67 to finish regulation at 25-under 263. The Americans forced the playoff on the last hole of regulation in alternate-shot play when Slocum made a 5-foot birdie putt. On the first playoff hole, Slocum missed a 7-foot birdie attempt that would have won it.
